about.about-us-description-1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Elit cursus amet lobortis iaculis. Mattis viverra mi cursus senectus tincidunt nibh. Dapibus enim neque lectus amet porttitor id orci. Quis nibh elit adipiscing placerat.
about.about-us-description-2: Armenia represents not just its 3 million residents but the dreams of almost 10 million Armenians worldwide. When one can be The Change, Nshan Karayan, a devoted Armenian from Polis at his 80s, decided to donate all his wealth to create One Roof for Armenian talents to Think, Learn, and Create together. The Arts, Crafts, and Technologies college will be left to Armenia on the condition that it will always serve as a symbol of unity for all Armenian youth from every region. It will be used for one purpose and one purpose only: Creating equal opportunities for high-level education for the Armenian generations, regardless of any condition.
